title: Sentry of Deceit - Roadstead
description: Hildegaard Streusselberg seethes when Mary Mahoney takes Marvin Schlick as her lover...until laying eyes on her new neighbor, Mario Mendez.But why have all of these very different people been brought together to live in an otherwise seemingly normal community in the first place? Hildie knows why, and Marvin knows. Mary and Mario, however, as well as a host of others, have selectively placed pieces of their memories on hold.
author: Lee Ashe
